1.content:
You woke up feeling like you'd slept outside in the dirt. You remembered going to bed in your room just like normal. Why would you feel any different now? You rubbed the sleep out of your eyes, and looked around. You jumped up in shock. You were in some kind of jungle! You then took a second look, and realized that all the trees were huge.

"No, they're not huge..." You said, looking down at the ground. All the grass was about as long as you, and some of it was twice as tall. You figured that you were only about an inch tall! You began to panic, and was about to start running around, when your left foot bumped into something. You looked down to see a book that was the size of books you'd remembered. You opened it up and began to read from a random page.

After all my research, I have found that all of the inhabitants of this strange world are female. I haven't had much time here anyway, but that seems the only possible way. And yet, they still multiply. I can only wonder why.

You closed the book, even more startled now. And then, a new thought occurred to you, and you opened it again, reading through it quickly. Only about a few pages in, it ended, the person writing about being chased by... Something. But you had learned one very important detail, at least.

Everything here was much larger than you.

You put the book back where you found it, having no way to carry it easily and still travel. It was then that you finally fully took in your surroundings. In one direction, you saw a lake of some sort, and off to the left of that looked like some kind of open field, probably a plain of some sort. You could always go deeper into the jungle, or head out to a more sandy area that you saw to the farther left of the plains. Probably a desert. Or you could just stay here for now,and try to figure things out.

After some thought, you decided what you would do.
1.title: Welcome to your New Home

11.content:
You decide to travel farther into the jungle. The other person had apparently been heading that way, so maybe you could find something helpful there. You began your trek.

After a while of walking, you'd noticed that the brush had gotten thicker, even though you hadn't been able to go as far as you'd like, because of your new size. Things would be more dangerous now, because the thick plants would block your view, but not of anything else that might otherwise harm you. You tried to be more aware of what might be happening around you and hurried your pace along.

After several hours of walking fast, you finally had to take a rest, or else you'd collapse and have no chance of survival. You sat down on the ground, in a sort of clearing in the brush. Then you lay back and looked up into the sky, trying to relax and think things out. It looked just like it did back home. Sure, you were far from home, and it was pretty dangerous, but things could have been a lot worse.

"Ha, I could have ended up in the stomach of some large animal or other creature! Thank goodness for that, at least." You said out loud, to no one in particular, just enjoying the moment. But then that ended when you heard a sweet feminine voice.

"Oh, that's too bad, because it looks like that's going to happen anyway."

You sat up and turned around to see...

113.content:
You were fairly surprised to see a Tiger, actually a Tigress because all the animals and other creatures were supposed to be female, was talking to you.

"You... You can talk?!"

You could almost see a grin on her face. "Why yes. Everything can. We all speak the Common Tongue. Of course, most predators as myself wouldn't let their prey know of their presence by speaking to them before hand, but you're so small anyway, it's not like you'll be able to get away." You could hear her purring, knowing that her meal was secured. You didn't like it, but you really didn't have a choice in the matter.

"So now you're just going to eat me?" You asked. For a reply, you were smacked gently with one of her paws, only knocking you over. You'd thought it would have hurt more, but you hadn't felt a thing. You tried to stand up, but her other paw then knocked you backwards. And every time you tried to stand up, the same thing repeated, knocking you in different directions, until finally you figured that you weren't going to get anywhere with that, and just lay there.

"Hmm? Giving up already? But I was having fun." She said mockingly, pretending to be a little disappointed. She had just been playing with you, and soon everything would be over.

"What if I offered you a deal? You show your worth and complete a challenge for me, and maybe I'll let you go free. Sound good?" You could see the hint of a renewed grin. It was a tempting deal, and there was always a chance that you'd actually survive... No, since she's just been playing with me up until now, she'd just give me some impossible task, or say that she'd decided not to let me go. Better just to get things over and done, I guess.

"Thanks for the offer, but no thanks. I'd rather just get the inevitable over with." You said, not in the politest tone. She didn't seemed phased at all, and you heard what almost sounded like a giggle.

"Fine, have it your way. I don't usually eat my prey alive, since I'm sure it's worse that way, but since you're depriving me of my fun, I'll take what I can get." She then used her claw to hook onto your shirt and lift you a little ways into the air. And then, with a swift upward motion, you were flung high into the air, flailing. You noticed that your shirt had ripped, but it didn't really seem to matter to you right now.

When you started coming back down, you looked to see that she had sat down on her haunches, her mouth wide open and head tilted up to catch you, tongue lolling out just a little. You took a nose dive, and landed right onto the rough, wet surface of the tongue. It pulled you into the mouth, dripping with lots of saliva, and then darkness.

She rolled you around, across her rough cat tongue, savoring you flavor. She'd never tasted anything like it. And you moving increased her pleasure. She wasn't cruel, and didn't usually eat live prey, as she'd said. But him depriving her of fun... Well, he'd asked for it. So she swallowed, enjoying your struggles as you slid down her throat.

You didn't know why you struggled against a hopeless situation, but you did, and as you slid through her throat, you felt her purring in satisfaction, obviously enjoying the feeling of live prey squirming as it went down. You then hit a wall of flesh, and was pushed through it as it opened to accept you, and then plopped into the stomach. You had thought it would smell really bad, but you didn't smell anything. Your nose probably wasn't working for some reason.

And then you realized that you were sitting in a pool of acid. And it wasn't burning you or anything. Well, your clothes had started to fall apart, but you didn't feel a thing. And that's when you put 2 and 2 together. You hadn't felt anything when you'd been smacked around earlier, and now you weren't being burned by the acid. So your body was invincible!

Deciding that you should get some rest while you had the chance, you crawled up out of the pool of acid and lay against a stomach wall, falling asleep soon after. When you woke, obviously several hours later, you were being flushed out of the stomach and down a tube, where you met a large waste build up. You hadn't been there long when it too was deposited onto the ground. You sat up and watched the Tigress walk away, not knowing that her prey had gotten out of her alive. You then climbed out of the pile of crap, and cleaned yourself off in a nearby river.

You then walked back into the jungle, hoping to find something helpful.

1132.content:
As you continued on through the jungle, the plants and brush grew thicker, and closer together. And it only grew more so until you almost couldn't get through without scraping yourself on some of the surprisingly sharp plant leaves. However, after a while, you finally made it through one clump, and found yourself in an extremely large clearing. And in the middle of the clearing, straight ahead, was what looked like a large gathering of houses. Maybe a village of some sort!

As you got closer, you saw that there were some houses built up into the trees as well, and all the ones on the ground were thatch roof, and made of hard baked clay bricks. When you finally made it to the edge of the closest house, you saw that it was actually larger than you had thought before. You could see much larger buildings, and stalls, creating alleys. This village was more like a very old city!

When you'd finally gotten close enough to look at a larger area, which seemed to be a marketplace, you were amazed. There were tons of naked women walking around! But that wasn't even the most surprising part. You could see that some of them had snake tails instead of legs. Others had wings and antenna, and others had tails, cat ears, and even some whiskers, and all of their ears, tails, and hair seemed to match that of a type of cat!

It wasn't until then that you noticed your danger. One of the cat girls, what looked like an Orange Tabby cat, was walking this way and didn't seem to notice you at all! She would step on you if you didn't run away. So you did, right down the nearest alley. You figured that if you just stayed out of sight and watched them for now, you would be able to decide if they were dangerous to you too.

Though it was a sound plan, there was one thing you didn't consider. Whether or not any of the creatures would be in alleyways or not. And that mistake was going to cost you your entire plan.

When you finally came to a halt in a darker part of the alley, you stood there catching your breath. You could go back later, but for now you needed to rest. Then you felt something cold and scaly wrap itself around you, and yank you in the air. It held you before a woman's face. She had pitch black hair, and a fairly attractive face. When you glanced down, you saw that her breasts weren't very large.

"Mmm. It would ssseem that Morgana hasss found herssself a tasssty treat. I don't know what kind of creature you are, but it was sssstupid of you to come to thisss city. Unless that iss, you intended to be sssomeone'sss sssnack. In which cassse, you'll be Morgana'ssss." She said to you. She then opened her mouth to put you in with her tail, as you saw she was one of the snake girls like in the marketplace.

You hoped that you could figure a way out of this while you delayed for time. "Wait!" You shouted. Morgana, looking a little bit surprised, closed her mouth and looked at you. "You can't just eat me!" You said. And if she did, you didn't know if you'd get out. Especially if her intestines worked like a snakes.

"And why not?" She almost demanded of you. She seemed intrigued by your argument and would at least hear you out.

"Because I could offer you so much more!"

"Sssuch asss...? Morgana isss poor. Ssshe cannot afford the luxuriesss of the rich, and never passsessss up a meal."

Maybe that was your ticket out of here. "W-well, I could please you! Let me pleasure you, and then..." An idea suddenly came to you. "And then you could sell me to someone rich! Charge a lot of money for some kind of rare pet or something, and get enough money to buy something that will fill you more."

Morgana seemed to actually consider this. "And you will pleassssure me?" She inquired, glancing at you, a grin on her face. She seemed to at least like that part of the idea. You shook your head yes.

And then she dropped you into her hand, bringing it down to a small slit in her scales that must have been her vagina. And then you were plunged in, her hand still on your feet. She then pulled you out, and then pushed you back in, repeating the process as her speed also increased. And then she orgasmed, spraying the ground with her vaginal fluids. She held you back up to her face, your naked body drenched in her love juice.

Morgana then opened her mouth, and before you could object, you were tossed inside and swirled around in a large amount of saliva. Just when you'd thought it was all over, you were pressed through her lips, and came out mostly clean and dry.

"So you're not going to eat me?" You asked, amazed you'd come back out of her mouth instead of down to her stomach.

Her grip loosened, and you continued to squirm, forgetting about gravity until it was too late. Your squirms dislodged you. Right down into her hungry, gaping throat. Your head barely brushed the uvula as you tried to push yourself out to stop your decent, but to no avail. As soon as you hit the esophagus, it pulled you down, carrying you into her awaiting gut.

As soon as you turn around, you find yourself face to face with massive girl. Yet, this girl was unlike anything you had ever seen before. Her entire body was covered in a layer of light green scales, and she had piercing yellow eyes that seemed to stare right into your very soul. She also had a long tail and a row of green spikes along her spine. Her appearance was like that of an anthro iguana, but you couldn't help finding her body incredibly sexy. Her large breasts were very alluring, and her figure in general was absolutely flawless.

Then you remembered what she just said to you; this sexy lizard girl was going to eat you! You immediately turn to try and run, but the lizard girl simply lashed out her tail and wrapped it around your minuscule body. She then lifted you off the ground with her tail and dropped you into the palm of her scaly hand. Staring at you with a predatory gaze, the lizard girl hungrily ran her tongue around her lips. You were absolutely terrified by her now. You couldn't believe that this figure of beauty was about to eat you alive!

"Please Miss, I'm begging you! Please don't eat me!"

"Aw, but you look like such a cute and delectable little morsel... Don't worry though, I'll try to make this quick and painless for you."

"No! Anything but that! Please, I don't want to die!"

You were utterly horrified. At this point you had begun to burst into tears. Your life was about to be cut tragically short by this lizard girl, and there was absolutely nothing that you could do about it. As she held you over her mouth, however, the lizard girl began to have second thoughts. Was it truly okay to end the life of such a defenseless creature? Sure she had eaten many other prey just like him in the past, but this was the first time that her prey was actually a sentient being. After carefully thinking it over, she decided that it really wouldn't be fair. If this small creature was capable of rational thought, then his life shouldn't be hers to take. Placing her trembling and teary-eyed prey back onto the ground below her, she decided to apologize.

"Alright little guy, I guess that I'll let you go... I'm sorry for scaring you..."

Looking up at her in shock, you wonder what it was that brought about this change of heart. As scared as you were of her, the fact that she decided not to eat you might mean that she wasn't all that bad after all. Nervously, you decide to approach her and speak.

"Thank you so much, Miss... But why are you just letting me go now?"

"Well, I thought about how you must have felt. You're the first prey I've ever caught that was able to think like I can. If you're capable of the same thoughts and emotions as me, then it really wouldn't be fair for me to just eat you like a common mouse. Your life is yours to live, little guy. I don't have any right to steal that from you."

"Do you really mean that?"

"Yeah! Just because I'm cold blooded doesn't mean that I have a cold heart! I'm willing to be merciful to you, so you should probably be on your way now."

"Thank you, Miss. I really appreciate this, but..."

"But?"

"Well you see, I'm not actually from around here... I don't know anything about this place, and I could probably use some help to stay safe. Would it be okay if I stayed with you for now?"

"You want to come with me? After I just tried to eat you?!"

"But you didn't eat me! I can tell that you're a kind person deep down. Please?"

"Sure, I guess... But are you sure about this?"

"Yeah. I think that we can become great friends."

"You really would be my friend? Alright little guy, it's a deal! My name is Elizabeth, but everyone just calls me Lizzy. And who might you be?"

"My name is Steven, and it's really nice to meet you Lizzy."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------

133.content:
As you walked, you spotted something in the distance. You couldn't quite figure out what it was, so you decided you wanted a closer look, and soon. Anything to relieve your boredom. So you started running as fast as you could.

After about 10 minutes of running, you had to slow down to catch your breath. You could now see that it was a large animal on fairly tall legs. And after a little bit more time walking, you finally identified it.

It was a large brown horse. You figured it was as safe as anything else to try and get a closer, much closer, look, so you plowed ahead. And after another 10 minutes, you had finally made it to the large beast.

It took only a few glances at the towering mammal to identify it was female, like that journal had said everything here was. Though you weren't sure why. And you also admired how, despite the fact this animal was quite obviously a wild horse, it's coat seemed to gleam.

"Wow, what a beautiful creature..." You trailed off, not knowing what else to say, or even if you should say anything.

"Well thank you." You heard as the horse turned and looked down at you. If she hadn't noticed you before, it was fairly obvious she did now. And then the realization, and the shock that came with it, hit you.

"You can talk?! How-" You started but were cut off as the horse looked down at you dubiously.

"Of course I can talk. Everything here talks the same. And I can talk for the same reasons you can." You just stared, dumb-founded.

"And it would seem that in your stupor, you forgot to introduce yourself. So tell me, what is your name?"

The question jumped you back to reality. If this could be called that. "Oh, well, my name is [your name here]."

"Well, I can't say it's been a pleasure meeting you. Yet. But my name is Serene." She said. Then she took a step toward you, which you didn't really take notice of. But then as she got closer, you started to be afraid. This Serene was a whole lot larger than you, and could easily do anything she wanted to you.

She then bent down her head and whispered something, but despite how close her head was to you, you weren't able to make out what you said. You looked up at her, questioningly, and could make out a sheepish grin, filled heavily with mischief, on her long face.

She seemed to under stand that you hadn't heard her, so she repeated herself, slightly louder. "I said earlier that it wasn't yet a pleasure to meet you. But as I'm sure you know is a rule of this world, the large have their way with the small. And since I'm so much larger than you, I think I'd like to give both of us a new experience." Her tongue came out and licked around her large, thick lips, allowing you to see the also large, square teeth in her mouth.

And then it dawned on you what she had planned. And you didn't like it one little bit. "W-w-wait! Isn't there something else I could do for you? Something that would be just as satisfying?"

She seemed to think it over. "Well, there is something..." You were overjoyed that she wasn't going to eat you.

"Anything, just name it!"

"Well then, I'd like you to come open a Water Gourd for me. They're supposed to have the most delicious drink inside of them, but whenever I try to crack open the soft outside, it just busts and all the water goes into the ground before I can get any."

You nodded your head in agreement, and started climbing her leg to get to her back. When you were half way up her leg, she started into a gallop, and you had to hold onto thick fur coat to not fall off.

After only a short while, covering a very large distance, you came to a small cluster of trees, and Serene stopped. You slid down her leg, and looked around. There, only a few paces from you, was a very, very large gourd, with what looked like a very tough exterior. However, upon further inspection, it was quite soft, which gave you an idea.

You looked around and quickly found a twig that seemed sturdy enough to work as some kind of knife. You then climbed up to where the gourd walls started to grow closer together. You then stuck your twig knife in, and the shell cut like butter. It took you a little while, but you eventually made it all the way around.

You then tossed away the twig and pushed, removing the lid you had created. And then you put one final shove with all your effort, and it was onto the ground. But you had accidentally leaned to far in, and you tumbled over the edge of the now bowl of water, making a small splash.

You resurfaced to see Serene looking down thirstily, and hungrily, at the bowl you had created.

"There, I helped open your gourd. Would you mind helping me out of here?"

You saw Serene lick her lips, and grin. "Yes. Yes, of course I'll get you out of that gourd bowl. And into my stomach!"

The shock was obvious on your face. "But you said that if I helped you get this open you'd not eat me!"

"Actually, I never said anything of the like. I just asked if you'd do this, and you agreed. Besides, I had intended to do this from the start. I've eaten small creatures about your size before, so if we're both going to have a new experience, it has to be a little different. And I've never drank a Water Gourd with my prey in it."

And then she was upon you. Her snout was in the water, sucking it in. And then the undercurrent pulled you under. You were able to open your eyes to watch what was happening. You saw yourself pass her large teeth, and then darkness. You were carried along with the current of water down her rather large, long throat.

As you are washed down Serene's esophagus with the sweet water from the Water Gourd, you try to swim against the current, though you already know it's too late, you just couldn't give up like that. But despite your efforts, you are still pulled along for the ride.

And although you didn't know it, your course wouldn't be what you, or even Serene, thought. Because of the strong pull of the rushing sweet water in her throat, you would end up in Serene's bladder, instead of in her stomach, and thus avoid digestion.

When the water finally entered a large chamber, which you thought was the stomach, you fell a little ways into the deep pool forming inside. When you resurfaced, you were covered in not only the sweet water, but now a foul smelling liquid as well.

You tried to cover your nose. Ugh, this smells like horse pee... You thought. And then reality set in. By some miracle, you had been saved from digestion. Now all you had to do was wait until she peed, and you'd be able to get away.

You waited for several hours, treading the foul stuff in order to stay afloat. But then finally, you felt a new current being formed from below. You knew it was time, and dived down, hoping to get out with the current as well. And soon enough, you had been pulled into the flow.

It took only a few minutes to reach the waterfall of urine that she was releasing, and then you splashed through it, landing in a puddle of urine, but glad to be out of her body. Serene finishes her buisiness, splashing you with some more yellow liquid, and then walks away, never knowing that you had escaped feeding her body.

You look around a little bit and find a stream to wash off in. When you finally think that you've washed the stench away, you see that it's getting dark now, and you'd need a good place to spend the night. However, you realize there are no trees to climb into, or anything like that, so you just walk on for now.

When it's finally too dark for you to see, you decide to just sleep out here in the grass. So you lay down, the grass providing some protection from being seen, and fall asleep.

Little did you know, that something else would be making you it's midnight snack.

13322211.content:
Using a nearby hollow tree base as cover, you establish a sort of camp site as you wait out the mermaid. She probably lives close by, so the best option for getting fresh water will be to wait until night, when she falls asleep. Of course, that foxgirl will likely be searching for prey at that time, since foxes are nocturnal and hunt at night. The best you can do is hope that she is somewhere else while you make your daring attempt.
The sky slowly fades from blue to orange, and the beams of light that previously shown through the leaves now become dimmer and dimmer. You peak you head out of your hole and see the mermaid still lounging at the edge of the lake. A look of fatigue forms on her face; the duration of her wait is clearly taking its toll on her. The sun continues to move downward, now removing the golden hue that was previously covering the land. Your eyes strain to make out the still-resting form of the mermaid, who appears tired, yet determined, in her pursuit of you.
Man, what did I do to deserve this? you wonder, realising that the maiden will not move on. Perhaps now is the time to make a move for the water before her eyes and sense adjust.

154.content:
The giantess lowering herself down to get a closer look was a 15ft tall anthropomorphic hippopotamus. She was absolutely massive to an inch high shrunken human like you. Fitting a hippopotamus, she was massively fat with a 20ft belly, H-cup breasts and a 25ft wide butt. She had gold-colored skin with long blonde hair and rainbow-colored tribal tattoos on her arms and the sides of her face. She wore a tiara that looked like it was made out a jawbone of another hippopotamus along with a pair of amber earrings, a green tank top and a green thong with white stars on it that looked like it was tattooed to her massive behind. She also had a large knife tied to her thigh, which meant she was clearly a warrior woman. You definitely don’t think letting her see you would be a good idea, so you run underneath her large belly as she’s looking down.

The gold hippopotamus giantess puts her knee to the ground, sure that she saw something and then rubs her chins. You managed to sneak out from right behind her and then you stare at how colossal her butt was. Sure, it was natural for a hippopotamus to have such an enormous rear, but hers was totally enormous. It looked like it could knock down trees. You then decide to take a look into the book and there depicts a page with a hippopotamus woman wearing armor like a tribal warrior. You decide to read the book to yourself to get a good idea of what you’re up again. “Do not venture into the territory of the hippozons. They are a race of warrior women ruled by an indomitable queen larger and heavier than the others. No man who ventures into the territory of these giantesses has ever returned. As such, it is unknown if the hippozons are hostile or not. What is known is that they are a tribe of hunters.” That large gold hippo woman must be a hunter, or even the hippo queen. You remember that hippopotami were territorial, temperamental and could bite people in half when enraged. Perhaps sticking around the giant golden hippo was not a good idea.

Suddenly the ground begins to shake again and then you look up and see another giantess walking up to the queen. She was a copper-skinned hippo who looked like she was as big as the gold one. She had long black hair and wore a a red-orange vest worn with no shirt or bra and what looked like a turquoise loincloth. From what you saw, the copper hippopotamus worn nothing underneath her loincloth, leaving her lower half exposed from below. She was also carrying a quiver with a bow and arrows inside and there was a red-orange tattoo of a hippo’s foot over her left eye. The gold hippo lifted her head and then spoke with the copper hippo. However, you had no idea what they were saying because they were speaking in a language that you couldn’t identify. They did not appear to be hostile towards one another. info.brief_description: You wake up in a new world, but you're only a few inches tall.
info.description:
You wake up to find yourself in a very strange, very large jungle. And not just because it's vast. You're also only about an inch tall. But on the bright side, at least you can't die.

         All Fetishes are allowed and approved of, except for death. So no killing the main character, though being invincible kind of makes that impossible anyway.

         No Single Sentence Chapters, please. There are obvious exceptions to this, such as when an option needs to be given, but if you do that, please try to add to one of the options.

Obviously have fun with it, and enjoy yourself.

Good entries may receive Gift Points.
